data.text: @carolynstrom @actagainstcovid @SKGov @MerrimanPaul @PremierScottMoe @skgovcaucus Hi Carolyn, Nobel HSSE is a Registered Nurse ran Occupational Health firm that operates a private lab for RT PCR testing in Regina and Saskatoon. We give a pretty good discount for kids under 12 who require a PCR test.
@carolynstrom @SaskHealth We can also help some rural areas as well- we have a collection site in Oxbow.

@carolynstrom @SaskHealth Hi Carolyn, Nobel HSSE is a Registered Nurse ran Occupational Health firm that operates a private lab for RT PCR testing in Regina and Saskatoon. We give a pretty good discount for kids under 12 who require a PCR test.
@carolynstrom @SKGov @MerrimanPaul @PremierScottMoe @skgovcaucus People are gonna be pouring into emergencies to get a paid for PCR test

@jessalynthe1st @Sarah_in_SK @carolynstrom @SKGov @MerrimanPaul @PremierScottMoe @skgovcaucus ..you’d like to continually test and isolate that it’ll be on your own dime and doing. I can assure you Heath measures weren’t  lifted world wide on a whim…🙄

@jessalynthe1st @Sarah_in_SK @carolynstrom @SKGov @MerrimanPaul @PremierScottMoe @skgovcaucus I’m honestly sorry that you feel you need to seclude your child from a normal life, but you need to understand that the data is there that shows this isn’t that big of a deal anymore. Symptoms, side effects, non incidental hospitalization is very low. It’s at the point where if..
@carolynstrom @SKGov @MerrimanPaul @PremierScottMoe @skgovcaucus Remember when Sask actually used to give a crap about the citizens? Crazy times.

@carolynstrom @SKGov @MerrimanPaul @PremierScottMoe @skgovcaucus I am trying to think of any other essential lab test that our publically funded health care system does not cover and can’t think of any .  How is this not a contravention of the Canada Health Act re: accessibility?
